DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Eating diet high fruit vegetable low fat may lower risk type cancer . Dietary counseling may effective help woman change healthy diet . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study well individual counseling and/or computer-based counseling work help healthy woman adopt cancer prevention diet .
DOC.brief_title: Individual Counseling and/or Computer-Based Counseling Helping Healthy Women Adopt Cancer Prevention Diet
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare 3- , 12- , 18-month change self-reported daily serving fruit vegetable percent energy fat healthy woman undergo dietary modification intervention comprise in-person individualized counseling v automate computer-based counseling v dietary modification intervention vs automate computer-based physical activity counseling ( control ) . - Compare efficacy long-term effect intervention participant . - Compare participant acceptance intervention , term proportion characteristic ( e.g. , age race ) participant accept intervention participate intervention activity . - Compare initial dietary change , term dietary habit , socio-demographics , self-efficacy , participant undergoing intervention . - Compare maintenance dietary change , term demographic , self efficacy , perceive community environmental support , participant undergoing intervention . - Compare cost deliver intervention participant . - Compare cost intervention use routine practice . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Participants randomize 1 4 arm . - Arm I ( in-person individualize dietary modification counsel ) : Participants undergo in-person individualized counseling week 0 3 receive phone call counselor week 1 , 6 , 9 increase daily fruit vegetable intake 5-9 serving reduce fat intake 25 % energy . - Arm II ( automate computer-based dietary modification counsel ) : Participants undergo automate computer-based counseling week 0 3 receive automate phone call week 1 , 6 , 9 increase daily fruit vegetable intake 5-9 serving reduce fat intake 25 % energy . - Arm III ( in-person individualize automated computer-based dietary modification counsel ) : Participants undergo in-person individualized counseling automate computer-based counseling week 0 3 receive phone call counselor week 6 automate phone call week 1 9 increase daily fruit vegetable intake 5-9 serving reduce fat intake 25 % energy . - Arm IV ( automate computer-based physical activity counsel [ control ] ) : Participants undergo automate computer-based counseling week 0 3 receive automate phone call week 1 , 6 , 9 increase daily physical activity moderate amount ( 20-30 minute per day ) . After study completion , patient follow 3 , 12 , 18 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 600 participant ( 150 per arm ) accrue study within 2 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Healthy participant Not undergoing care cancer Kaiser Permanente health plan member least 2 year No current dietary goal No diet comprise average consumption > 4 combined serving fruit vegetable per day and/or fat consumption 30 % total energy No physicianprescribed diet PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age 30 70 Sex Female Performance status Not specify Life expectancy Not specify Hematopoietic Not specify Hepatic Not specify Renal Not specify Other Not pregnant PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy Not specify Chemotherapy Not specify Endocrine therapy Not specify Radiotherapy Not specify Surgery Not specify
DOC.keyword: unspecified adult solid tumor , protocol specific
